import React, { useContext } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {GlobalState} from '../../../../GlobalState' function BtnRender({product}) { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [products] = state.productsAPI.products const [isAdmin] = state.UserAPI.isAdmin const addCart = state.UserAPI.addCart return (
{ isAdmin ? <> Delete Edit : <> addCart(product)}> Buy View }
) } export default BtnRender
